001package reciprocal.linear.vector;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import java.util.List;
008import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
009
010/**
011 * Immutable implementation of a vector which uses {@link Double} as type for its elements
012 *
013 * @since 0.0.1
014 */
015public final class DoubleVector extends AbstractVector<@NotNull Double, @NotNull DoubleVector, @NotNull Double> {
016    @Serial
017    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
018
019    DoubleVector(final int size, final @NotNull List<@NotNull VectorEntry<@NotNull Double>> entries) {
020        super(size, entries);
021    }
022
023    /**
024     * Returns {@link DoubleVectorBuilder}
025     *
026     * @param size size
027     * @return {@link DoubleVectorBuilder}
028     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code size < 1}
029     * @since 0.0.1
030     */
031    public static DoubleVectorBuilder ofSize(final int size) {
032        return new DoubleVectorBuilder(size);
033    }
034
035    @Override
036    public @NotNull DoubleVector add(final @NotNull DoubleVector summand) {
037        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
038        checkArgument(getSize() == summand.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(),
039            summand.getSize());
040        return new DoubleVector(getSize(),
041            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(e.element() + summand.getElement(e.index()))).toList()
042        );
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public @NotNull DoubleVector subtract(final @NotNull DoubleVector subtrahend) {
047        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
048        checkArgument(getSize() == subtrahend.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(),
049            subtrahend.getSize());
050        return new DoubleVector(getSize(),
051            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(e.element() - subtrahend.getElement(e.index()))).toList()
052        );
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public @NotNull Double dotProduct(final @NotNull DoubleVector other) {
057        requireNonNull(other, "other");
058        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
059        return getEntries().map(e -> e.element() * other.getElement(e.index())).reduce(Double::sum)
060            .orElseThrow();
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public @NotNull DoubleVector scalarMultiply(final @NotNull Double scalar) {
065        requireNonNull(scalar, "scalar");
066        return new DoubleVector(getSize(),
067            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(scalar * e.element())).toList());
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public @NotNull DoubleVector negate() {
072        return new DoubleVector(getSize(), getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(-e.element())).toList());
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public boolean orthogonalTo(final @NotNull DoubleVector other) {
077        requireNonNull(other, "other");
078        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
079        return dotProduct(other) == 0L;
080    }
081
082    @Override
083    public @NotNull Double taxicabNorm() {
084        return getElements().map(Math::abs).reduce(Double::sum).orElseThrow();
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    public @NotNull Double euclideanNorm() {
089        return Math.sqrt(euclideanNormPow2());
090    }
091
092    @Override
093    public @NotNull Double maxNorm() {
094        return getElements().map(Math::abs).max(Double::compareTo).orElseThrow();
095    }
096
097    @Override
098    protected @NotNull Double euclideanNormPow2() {
099        return getElements().map(e -> e * e).reduce(Double::sum).orElseThrow();
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Builder for {@link DoubleVector DoubleVectors}
104     *
105     * @since 0.0.1
106     */
107    public static final class DoubleVectorBuilder
108        extends AbstractVectorBuilder<Double, DoubleVector, DoubleVector.DoubleVectorBuilder> {
109        DoubleVectorBuilder(final int size) {
110            super(size, i -> 0.0D);
111        }
112
113        @Override
114        public @NotNull DoubleVector build() {
115            return new DoubleVector(getSize(), computeEntries());
116        }
117    }
118}
